Let
( Ω , Σ , μ )

F

⁢

( μ )

> ϵ 0

> δ 0

≤

( E )
δ

para.p:
In other words, to say that
F
is equi-integrable means that

Math.text: (limit _ (mu * E to 0))@((supremum _ (f element-of F))@((integral _ E)@(absolute-value@(f) * differential-d@(mu)))) = 0

( μ )
